title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.32 - Fueling, defueling, lubricating or cleaning of vehicles in berths or parking areas prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.32 - Fueling, defueling, lubricating or cleaning of vehicles in berths or parking areas prohibited

State Regulations

No automotive vehicle shall be fueled or defueled, lubricated or cleaned in a berth or in the vehicular parking area of a truck
terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.32

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
